definition: mutual trust and friendship among people who spend a lot of time together
sentence: The camaraderie among the teammates was evident during the championship game.

definition: filled with or characterized by a lively energy and excitement
sentence: The exuberant crowd cheered as the band took the stage.

definition: of such excellence or beauty as to inspire great admiration
sentence: The view from the mountain top was simply sublime.
She presented a cogent argument that swayed many in the audience.
The inexorable march of time is something we all must accept.

definition: a moment of sudden revelation or insight
sentence: She had an epiphany that changed her perspective on life.

definition: a person who dislikes humankind and avoids human society
sentence: The misanthrope lived alone in a cabin far from civilization.

definition: obedient or attentive to an excessive or servile degree
sentence: His obsequious behavior towards his boss was noticeable to everyone.

definition: the quality of being obstinately resistant to authority
sentence: The recalcitrance of the dog made him difficult to train.
